description: Anonymous. Copied A.H. 708 [A.D. 1308]. Fols. 68; 17.4 x 12 cm.; written surface 15.3 x 10.5 cm.; 16 lines to page; on Arabic paper; in naskhi; with vowel signs. A commentary on Shihāb al-akhbār fī al-ḥikam wa-al-amthāl wa-al-ādāb min al-aḥādīth al-nabawīyah, a compendium of wisdom sayings and sermonettes selected from traditions by Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad al-Quḍāʻī, A.H. 454 [A.D. 1062]. The ground work is also known as Jawāhir al-kalim al-sunnīyah wa-badāʼiʻ al-ḥikam al-nabawīyah. Beg.: بسم الله ... جمىع المحافل ىنتمي مستعىنا في تلفىق ذلك Colophon: تم الکتاب بحمد الله ومنه وکرمه ىوم الاحد خامس ربىع الاخره سنة ثمان وسبعمائة وصلى الله على سىدنا محمد واله وصحبه وسلم تسلىما کثىرًا A few marginal notes and glosses. The title appears on the edges as Kitāb fī al-ḥadīth. The first folio is defective. MS in good condition; mended; Arabic binding. Acquired from Brill, Leyden, A.D. 1900.
title: Sharḥ Shihāb al-akhbār fī al-ḥikam wa-al-amthāl wa-al-ādāb min al-aḥādīth al-nabawīyah
